dc_title_s: Metro Transit (Bus Routes and Stops) City of Madison, WI 2018
dc_description_s: These data layers represent Madison Metro (mainline) bus routes and stops for the City of Madison, Wisconsin in 2018. The geodatabase includes: bus stops, routes, route pattern, and route trip information. There are several tables included with additional information. This data is derived from the General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) information from the City of Madison.
dc_creator_sm: City of Madison - Metropolitan Planning Organization (MPO)
uw_supplemental_s: This is an archived copy of the data held at UW-Madison. For the most recent version of this data please visit: https://data-cityofmadison.opendata.arcgis.com/
